- Annual – every 12 calendar months
- VOR – every 30 days (for IFR certified aircraft)
- 100 hour if airplane is for hire
- Altimeter/Pitot Static – every 24 calendar months
- Transponder – every 24 calendar months
- ELT – every 12 calendar months AND Battery must be replaced or recharged after 1 hour cumulative use or half of battery life
- Service bulletins and Airworthiness Directives (AD) complied with

(14 CFR §91.409)
